tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE analytics_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INTEGER REFERENCES geospatial_data(id),
    data_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    latitude DECIMAL(9,6),
    longitude DECIMAL(9,6)
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    location_id INT REFERENCES locations(location_id)
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_date DATE,
    order_total DECIMAL(10,2),
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE locations (
	location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	location_name TEXT,
	latitude DECIMAL,
	longitude DECIMAL,
	geography GEOGRAPHY
);

CREATE TABLE analytics_data (
	data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	location_id INT REFERENCES locations(location_id),
	client_id INT REFERENCES clients(client_id),
	data_type TEXT,
	date DATE
);
CREATE TABLE locations (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), address VARCHAR(100), latitude DECIMAL, longitude DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE regions (region_id INT PRIMARY KEY, region_name VARCHAR(50), area DECIMAL, population INT);
CREATE TABLE territories (territory_id INT PRIMARY KEY, territory_name VARCHAR(50), region_id INT REFERENCES regions(region_id));
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), phone_number VARCHAR(15));
CREATE TABLE sales_data (sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id), location_id INT REFERENCES locations(id), sale_date DATE, amount DECIMAL);
